website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for an oval-shaped commercial mirror will find their match in this attractive piece.
pros: Available to purchase in a number of different sizes and shapes
Product mounts easily with its symmetrical rails
Contemporary oval design works well with most bathroom decor
cons: A few customers found the mirror a little difficult to hang straight

customer_reviews.title: Do not support a company that does not support you
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been in construction for 12 years now and have installed probably close to 100 mirrors, all different variations and install tactics. To say that this install was the most inattentive to detail oriented as per instructions would be a massive understatement. All this company needed to do was provide a simple piece of paper with a template assisting with anchor placement. Instead, you are holding up the mirror tracing, or deciding your own timestaking method of install, which can result in the most minor of offsets, which as a result an un-level mirror. This company should be ashamed of their instructions and I would never buy this mirror again.
customer_reviews.author: manico22

customer_reviews.title: Looks very good
customer_reviews.text: I remodeled one of my two bathrooms about two years ago and I needed a good mirror to finish out the project. I poured through amazon's choices and came across this piece. I fell in love with it when I saw and I love it now every time I walk into the bathroom. It's fairly large and has a sleek modern look that matches well with the other items in the bathroom. I only had a hard time installing it because I had to drill into large porcelain tiles but I'm certain it's an easy install on sheet rock or small tiles. I highly recommend this mirror.
customer_reviews.author: H. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Looks great & great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this mirror. We hung it sideways as it fit the space better. The only thing that could be better is if there was a template provided. We hung it in an hour or so & took great care to measure 2x cut once. Hung on tile so needed to be very careful with our measurements Was easy to hang with 2 people but 1 could do it. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: CRP

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Modern
customer_reviews.text: I recently invited a few friends over having finally completed a full remodel of my house and the first thing they commented on when walked into the bathroom was this mirror. Sleek and stylish is fits in well with the rest of the satin fixtures. In terms of installation...I didn't install it myself and I think it would require some very careful measurements and leveling to get it right so I didn't attempt, fortunately on the day it was delivered my contractors handy man was doing other work around the house and volunteered to install it, only took him a few minutes.

customer_reviews.title: love the mirrors
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the mirrors for my bathroom. We orginially planned for the mirrors to be length wise on our wall. Due to our measuring errors, they wouldn't fit. So we turned the mirrors with the length sideways and staggered the holders. I am so pleased with the turn out doing them that way is really cool and neat looking. I purchased the mirrors because I needed to be sure there was plenty of air behind them and they are perfect. If you order be sure to allow for the space for the holders. I would use this product again.
